meanings.definition: The quality or state of being superlative.
meanings.sent1: Her superlativeness in academics earned her the top spot in the class.
meanings.sent2: The superlativeness of his performance was evident to everyone in the audience.
meanings.sent3: Despite his modesty, his friends couldn't help but tease him about his superlativeness in video games.
meanings.sent4: The superlativeness of her kindness shone through even in the smallest gestures.
meanings.sent5: The superlativeness of the view from the mountaintop took her breath away.

meanings.definition: The highest degree of a quality or attribute.
meanings.sent1: His superlativeness in speed made him the fastest runner on the team.
meanings.sent2: The superlativeness of her cooking skills was unmatched by anyone in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The superlativeness of his clumsiness always led to hilarious situations.
meanings.sent4: The superlativeness of the storm's fury left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The superlativeness of her creativity knew no bounds.

meanings.definition: Exaggerated or excessive praise or admiration.
meanings.sent1: The superlativeness of the reviews for the new restaurant made her curious to try it out.
meanings.sent2: His superlativeness in flattery often made others uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The superlativeness of her compliments always brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent4: The superlativeness of the award ceremony left her feeling overwhelmed with gratitude.
meanings.sent5: The superlativeness of his boasting about his achievements was met with skepticism by his peers.
